content.raw:
Example invocation of cmake for something which depends on gazebo:

```
#!

cmake \
-G"Eclipse CDT4 - Unix Makefiles" \
-D_ECLIPSE_VERSION=4.2 \
-DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Release \
-DCMAKE_SYSTEM_PREFIX_PATH=\
$HOME/workspace-install/bullet3\;\
$HOME/workspace-install/ign-math\;\
$HOME/workspace-install/ign-transport\;\
$HOME/workspace-install/sdformat\;\
$HOME/workspace-install/simbody\;\
$HOME/workspace-install/gazebo \
-DCMAKE_FRAMEWORK_PATH=$HOME/workspace-install/bullet3 \
-DPKG_CONFIG_USE_CMAKE_PREFIX_PATH=TRUE \
-DCMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX=$HOME/workspace-install/px4_sitl_gazebo \

```
content.html:
Example invocation of cmake for something which depends on gazebo:

cmake \
-G"Eclipse CDT4 - Unix Makefiles" \
-D_ECLIPSE_VERSION=4.2 \
-DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Release \
-DCMAKE_SYSTEM_PREFIX_PATH=\
$HOME/workspace-install/bullet3\;\
$HOME/workspace-install/ign-math\;\
$HOME/workspace-install/ign-transport\;\
$HOME/workspace-install/sdformat\;\
$HOME/workspace-install/simbody\;\
$HOME/workspace-install/gazebo \
-DCMAKE_FRAMEWORK_PATH=$HOME/workspace-install/bullet3 \
-DPKG_CONFIG_USE_CMAKE_PREFIX_PATH=TRUE \
-DCMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX=$HOME/workspace-install/px4_sitl_gazebo \
